Itemized Passive Description:
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 300%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Changes Ki Spheres: INT to Rainbow
- Guards all attacks
- Damage reduction rate 80%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When attacking*
- ATK 250%{passiveImg:up_g}
*When receiving an attack*
- DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For every attack received*
- {passiveImg:forever}Damage reduction rate 8%{passiveImg:down_r} (no more than -60%)
*When receiving a Ki Blast Super Attack*
- Nullifies it for 1 turn from the character's entry turn
- High chance of nullifying it starting from the 2nd turn from
the character's entry turn

5443.superDescription:
Massively raises ATK and raises DEF for 1 turn 
and causes immense damage to enemy

Active Skill.Name: Sphere of Destruction
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated starting from the 6th turn 
from the start of battle (once only)
